entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as standing alone in the dark and trying not to fall asleep.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is sleeping in the bedroom and later wakes up to greet Harry.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A person who has turned up to escort Harry and Ron across London.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: A person who has turned up to escort Harry and Ron across London, along with Tonks.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as described in the story when they share a bedroom and later greet each other.
Tonks and Mad-Eye are acquaintances, as described in the story when they turn up to escort Harry and Ron across London.
Harry is concerned about Ron's safety, as described in the story when he tries not to fall asleep because he might become a serpent and attack Ron.
